alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Harrison; Jefferson; Orange; Perry; Scott; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 28 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT AND AGAIN ON THURSDAY... The officials at the Indiana Department of Environmental Management have called for an Air Quality action day today, and again on Thursday for the state of Indiana...in effect until midnight EDT each night. Today, everyone may experience health effects. Members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects. Sensitive groups include the elderly...children...persons with asthma or other breathing problems...and persons with lung and heart disease. People in these groups are advised to greatly limit the outdoor activities to reduce their exposure to ozone and particulate pollution. Tomorrow, members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected. Sensitive groups include the elderly...children...persons with asthma or other breathing problems...and persons with lung and heart disease. People in these groups are advised to limit their outdoor activities to reduce their exposure to ozone and particulate pollution.
